'''Social stigma''' refers to severe social disapproval of personal characteristics or [[beliefs]] that are against cultural norms. Social stigma often leads to [[marginalization]].
Examples of social stigmas are physical or mental [[disabilities]] and [[disorder]]s, as well as [[homosexuality]] or affiliation with a specific [[nationality]], [[religion]] or [[ethnicity]]. [[Crime|Criminality]] carries a strong social stigma.
